meta.title: WalkScape: The Walking Role-Playing Fitness Game

callToAction.registerNow: <0>Register now</0> to apply for an invite or <1>support us</1> to ensure access!
callToAction.waveActive: We are currently sending out Beta invites!
callToAction.waveUndefined: The next closed Beta wave is coming soon! Subscribe to our <0>newsletter</0> and follow our <1>social media</1> to stay up to date!
callToAction.supportToStart: <0>Patreon</0> and <1>Buy Me a Coffee</1> supporters can now start playing immediately!

howToPlay.title: How to get access?
howToPlay.nextWave: The next wave of beta invites is
howToPlay.subscribe: Subscribe to our <0>newsletter</0> and follow our <1>social media</1> to stay up to date!
howToPlay.ensure: To ensure instant access to the game, you can also
howToPlay.waveExplain: WalkScape is currently in <0>Closed Beta</0>. This means that access is restricted to those who have filled out an application and are invited, or have supported us financially. This allows us to develop the game rapidly and with full focus, and to scale our server infrastructure in a financially sustainable way.
howToPlay.instructions: For step-by-step instructions on how to get access, go <0>here</0>!

gameSection.title: What is WalkScape?
gameSection.section-1: WalkScape is a game inspired by some old school MMORPGs. But this game has one major trick up its sleeve: you don't play actively, but instead gain progress by walking.
gameSection.section-2: You can expect a fun and exciting journey through the World of Arenum while also having the motivation to walk!

features.title: Features
features.levelUpSkills: Level up skills by walking in real life
features.numberOfSkills: Over 15 different skills to level up and master
features.communityFeatures: Community features, global marketplace and online leaderboards.
features.quests: Quests, random encounters and a main storyline spanning multiple continents.

screenshotsSection.title: Screenshots
screenshotsSection.description: Screenshots from the game covering some of the mechanics. You can find more on our Subreddit!
